channel.title: 法新社
channel.description: 这是一个追踪法新社news的种子

item.title: 七届一级方程式赛车冠军得主刘易斯-汉密尔顿（Lewis Hamilton）表示，他将于 2025 年转投法拉利车队，这将为他闪耀的职业生涯增添崭新的篇章，但他坚持认为，他希望能以优异的成绩离开梅赛德斯车队。
item.description:
Seven-time Formula 1 champion Lewis Hamilton says his switch to Ferrari programmed for 2025 will add a brand new chapter to his sparkling career, but insisted he hopes to leave Mercedes on a high.#AFPSports https://t.co/ppJm9slF2b

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) February 23, 2024

item.title: 视频：在秘鲁北部的一个省份，人们租用小船或步行推车艰难地渡过洪水泛滥的河流。
item.description:
VIDEO: In a northern province of Peru, people struggle to cross a flooding river by renting small boats or pushing vehicles on foot. pic.twitter.com/xtNftmyaEB

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) February 23, 2024

item.title: 哥伦比亚政府周五宣布进行一次考察，以从传奇的圣何塞大帆船残骸中清除 "价值无法估量 "的物品。
item.description:
Colombia's government on Friday announced an expedition to remove items of "incalculable value" from the wreck of the legendary San Jose Galleon, which sank in 1708 while laden with gold, silver and emeralds estimated to be worth billions of dollars.https://t.co/f2AV3GcFI7

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) February 23, 2024

item.title: 周五，农民们开着拖拉机来到巴黎市中心，向埃马纽埃尔-马克龙总统施压，马克龙承诺将在即将举行的法国农业博览会上与他们会面，讨论他们的不满。
item.description:
Farmers drove their tractors into central Paris on Friday to raise the pressure on President Emmanuel Macron, who has promised them a meeting at France's coming agriculture fair bonanza to discuss their grievances.https://t.co/qtfNmZuDaA

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) February 23, 2024

item.title: 随着亚美尼亚领导人尼科尔-帕希尼扬（Nikol Pashinyan）寻求减少这个小国对前主人俄罗斯的依赖，法国和亚美尼亚周五欢呼军事合作不断加强。
item.description:
France and Armenia on Friday hailed growing military cooperation as Armenian leader Nikol Pashinyan seeks to reduce his small country's dependence on former master Russia.https://t.co/gDydzcfxHF

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) February 23, 2024

item.title: 周六，阿森纳将在酋长球场迎战纽卡斯尔，他们将在英超联赛中取得六连胜。
item.description:
Mikel Arteta has urged Arsenal fans to produce "full energy" as they chase a sixth straight Premier League win against Newcastle at the Emirates Stadium on Saturday.#AFPSports https://t.co/dVZRBABSbW

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) February 23, 2024

item.title: 对于全球最大的科技公司来说，2024 年将是变革的一年，因为它们将屈服于下个月生效的欧盟规则，从而改变欧洲人使用从谷歌到 Instagram 等广受欢迎的平台的方式。
item.description:
2024 will be a year of change for the world's biggest tech companies as they bow to EU rules that come into force next month, shaking up how Europeans use vastly popular platforms from Google to Instagram.https://t.co/UKzA48VF1o pic.twitter.com/PadslCxrl1

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) February 23, 2024

item.title: 视频：在加拿大西部的地下，数十场始于去年的所谓 "僵尸大火 "仍在燃烧。
item.description:
VIDEO: Beneath the ground in Western Canada, dozens of so-called "zombie fires" that started last year are still burning. pic.twitter.com/uSmfhj0LwX

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) February 23, 2024

item.title: 在周日对阵切尔西的联赛杯决赛之前，利物浦可能会获得重大鼓舞，穆罕默德-萨拉赫、达尔文-努涅斯和多米尼克-索博斯莱都有可能在伤病问题之后上场比赛。
item.description:
Liverpool could be handed a major boost ahead of the League Cup final against Chelsea on Sunday, with Mohamed Salah, Darwin Nunez and Dominik Szoboszlai all in contention to play after injury problems.#AFPSports https://t.co/NkRqfu9SAe

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) February 23, 2024

item.title: 新西兰开设了第一家专门治疗奇异鸟的医院，兽医们已经将第一位病人--一只跌入游泳池的昵称为 "Splash "的雏鸟--救回了健康。
item.description:
New Zealand has opened its first hospital exclusively treating kiwi birds, and vets have already nursed the first patient back to health -- a chick nicknamed "Splash" that tumbled into a swimming pool.https://t.co/kD8AEfdmjx

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) February 23, 2024

item.title: 杰米-乔治（Jamie George）坚称，尽管周六在穆雷菲尔德（Murrayfield）举行的比赛距他母亲去世仅一周多的时间，但他对在与苏格兰的六国比赛中担任队长毫无保留。
item.description:
Jamie George has insisted he has no qualms about captaining England in what is always a highly-charged Six Nations clash with Scotland even though Saturday's match at Murrayfield takes place just over a week after the death of his mother.#AFPSports https://t.co/KxIPmHC6Nb

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) February 23, 2024

item.title: 自 10 月 7 日以来，位于特拉维夫北部凯撒利亚的新创公司 InfiniDome 一直在夜以继日地工作，以防止以色列军队的微型无人机在加沙受到廉价而简单的干扰拦截。
item.description:
Since October 7, InfiniDome, a start-up based in Caesarea, north of Tel Aviv, has been working around the clock to prevent the Israeli army's mini-drones from being intercepted by cheap and simple jamming in Gaza.https://t.co/am5PzQh5V4

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) February 23, 2024

item.title: 在周五的第四次测试中，印度快速投手阿卡什-迪普（Akash Deep）首次登场就投中三个小门，乔-鲁特（Joe Root）打出 106 分的不败战绩，带领英格兰队摆脱早期困境。
item.description:
Joe Root hit an unbeaten 106 to lead England's recovery from early trouble after Indian fast bowler Akash Deep took three wickets on debut in the fourth Test on Friday.#AFPSports https://t.co/l6bIwEpQBl

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) February 23, 2024

item.title: 视频：突尼斯的哈福兹镇位于以失业率和自杀率居高不下而闻名的贫困地区，但突尼斯 88 组织每周五举办的音乐课却能帮助人们振奋精神。
item.description:
VIDEO: The Tunisian town of Haffouz lies in an impoverished region known for high rates of joblessness and suicide, but every Friday music classes run by Tunisia 88 help to lift spirits. pic.twitter.com/hmzC3FUY9R

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) February 23, 2024

item.title: 周五，国际体育仲裁法庭（CAS）驳回了俄罗斯对国际奥委会（IOC）禁赛的上诉。
item.description:
Russia's appeal against its suspension by the International Olympic Committee (IOC) was dismissed by the Court of Arbitration for Sport (CAS) on Friday.#AFPSports https://t.co/FIBVl0uIlS

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) February 23, 2024

item.title: "生活在伦敦的乌克兰难民尤利娅-扎布罗兹卡（Yulia Zabrodska）告诉法新社记者，她参加了一个艺术项目，该项目突出了她所在社区的困境。
item.description:
"It shows our strength, our soul, our pain," Yulia Zabrodska, a Ukrainian refugee living in London, told AFP of an art project she's in that highlights the plight of her community.https://t.co/dg1BIjnp5a

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) February 23, 2024

item.title: #如果普京 "不付出代价"，他将继续破坏：拜登
item.description:
#BREAKING Putin will continue destruction if he 'does not pay the price': Biden pic.twitter.com/nKANtZdMEH

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) February 23, 2024

item.title: 视频：随着 2021 年阿富汗数十年战争的结束，汽车驾驶员们正利用新发现的安全优势，让他们的改装车在比赛中相互较量，或展示漂移技巧。
item.description:
VIDEO: With the end of decades of war in Afghanistan in 2021, motorists are taking advantage of newfound security to pit their souped-up cars against each other in races, or show off drifting skills. pic.twitter.com/CmSiolooGI

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) February 23, 2024

item.title: 位于以色列最北部山区的基里亚特什莫纳（Kiryat Shmona）几乎空无一人，几乎没有商店开门营业，来往于黎巴嫩边境附近山谷基地的道路上大多是军车。
item.description:
Kiryat Shmona, in the hills of Israel's far north, is virtually empty, with few shops open and mostly military traffic on the roads to and from bases up the valley near the Lebanese border.https://t.co/STAXCkQcfk

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) February 23, 2024

item.title: 自阿波罗时代以来，美国飞船首次登陆月球：这是一个无人驾驶的商业机器人，由美国国家航空航天局（NASA）资助，为美国宇航员在本十年晚些时候重返地球的宇宙邻居铺平道路。
item.description:
For the first time since the Apollo era, an American spaceship has landed on the Moon: an uncrewed commercial robot, funded by NASA to pave the way for US astronauts to return to Earth's cosmic neighbor later this decade.https://t.co/VFlAlibuH0 pic.twitter.com/UUN1n9sL6Y

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) February 23, 2024

item.title: 在罗伯特-莱万多夫斯基（Robert Lewandowski）及时恢复状态的推动下，西甲卫冕冠军巴塞罗那（Barcelona）最近几周的卫冕之路可谓步履维艰。
item.description:
Reigning La Liga champions Barcelona's faltering title defence has been kept just about alive in recent weeks, boosted by Robert Lewandowski's timely return to form.#AFPSports https://t.co/Sk3dAUSxlB

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) February 23, 2024

item.title: "二月的一个周六，伦敦一家夜总会的大门敞开，一群人翘首以待。但现在不是凌晨时分，而是午后，派对将于晚上 8 点结束。
item.description:
"It's like being in my 20s again -- It's really good fun, brilliant!"
A crowd eagerly waits for the doors of a London nightclub to open on a Saturday in February. But it's not the small hours -- it's mid-afternoon and the party will end at 8:00 pm.https://t.co/4MWI7EDIig

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) February 23, 2024

item.title: 视频：南非著名艺术家埃斯特-马赫兰古（Esther Mahlangu）的回顾展将于本周在开普敦的 Iziko 南非国家美术馆开幕，展品包括一辆绘有彩色图案的旧宝马车、抽象作品和历史照片，随后将进行国际巡展。
item.description:
VIDEO: From an old BMW painted in colourful shapes to abstract works and historic photographs, a retrospective of celebrated South African artist Esther Mahlangu opens this week at the Iziko South African National Gallery in Cape Town, before going on an international tour. pic.twitter.com/weZ7Casc1T

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) February 23, 2024

item.title: 法国著名的埃菲尔铁塔周五关闭了第五天，因为工作人员继续就纪念碑的管理问题举行罢工。
item.description:
France's famed Eiffel Tower was closed for a fifth day on Friday as staff maintained a strike over the monument's management, unions said.https://t.co/O56HmnRnSm

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) February 23, 2024

item.title: 视频：吉尼斯世界纪录（GWR）宣布，由于没有确凿证据证明博比的年龄，此前被评为世界上最年长的狗的称号已被追授。
item.description:
VIDEO: Bobi, previously crowned the world's oldest dog, has been posthumously stripped of his title due to inconclusive evidence of his age, the Guinness World Records (GWR) announced. pic.twitter.com/jQfJbEXTnO

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) February 23, 2024

item.title: 视频：中国的珠宝商正在考虑一个新的、快速增长的消费群体--年轻人，他们越来越热衷于购买黄金，将其视为经济不稳定时期的一种安全投资。
item.description:
VIDEO: Jewellers in China are considering a new and fast-growing consumer base -- younger people, who are increasingly keen to buy gold, seeing it as a safe investment in uncertain economic times. pic.twitter.com/7rInSEVnSu

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) February 23, 2024

item.title: 西班牙东部巴伦西亚一座 14 层高的公寓大楼发生大火，至少有 4 人死亡，据报至少有 14 人失踪，官员们周五警告说，死亡人数可能会上升。
item.description:
At least four people died in a huge fire that ripped through a 14-storey apartment block in Valencia, eastern Spain, and at least 14 were reported missing, with officials warning on Friday that the death toll could rise.https://t.co/8bcTubNIto pic.twitter.com/6JTWJe7Jbm

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) February 23, 2024

item.title: 视频：数百人涌向肯尼亚西部的一个村庄，向本月早些时候在交通事故中丧生的马拉松世界纪录保持者凯尔文-基普图姆（Kelvin Kiptum）致敬。
item.description:
VIDEO: Hundreds of people flock to a village in western Kenya to honour and pay tribute to marathon world record-holder Kelvin Kiptum, who died earlier this month in a road accident pic.twitter.com/2obTJ1VruN

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) February 23, 2024

item.title: 视频：费夫齐-阿利乌（Fevzi Aliu）是科索沃首府普里什蒂纳的一名农民，在他照料的动物中，有几只是当地特有的物种。这些被称为 "科索沃长鸣鸡 "的公鸡大多长着黑色羽毛，它们可以嘶哑地鸣叫近 90 秒钟而不停歇。
item.description:
VIDEO: Fevzi Aliu, a farmer in Kosovo capital Pristina, counts among the animals under his care several specimens of a unique local species. Known as 'Kosovo Longcrowers', these largely black-feathered roosters can issue their hoarse crow for almost 90 seconds without stopping. pic.twitter.com/fErs713GO1

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) February 23, 2024

item.title: 科技巨头屈服于欧盟新规.2024 年将是全球最大科技公司的变革之年，因为它们将屈服于下月生效的欧盟规则，改变欧洲人使用从谷歌到 Instagram 等广受欢迎的平台的方式。
item.description:
Tech titans yield to new EU rules.

2024 will be a year of change for the world's biggest tech companies as they bow to EU rules that come into force next month, shaking up how Europeans use vastly popular platforms from Google to Instagramhttps://t.co/UKzA48WcQW pic.twitter.com/XUs0lFML6H

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) February 23, 2024
